Player History
Injured on 8/23/2001 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/1/2002, off Erik Sabel (MON)...
Released by Cincinnati on 2/27/2004...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 5/1/2005 to a minor league deal...
Released by San Francisco on 8/16/2005...
Drafted in 3rd round, 60th overall pick, by New York (A) in 2008...
Earned first career win on 5/4/2008...
Injured on 4/4/2010 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 8/17/2011 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 6/12/2015 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Released by New York (A) on 6/8/2016...
Drafted in 8th round, 215th overall pick, by Detroit in 2018...
Injured on 4/30/2018 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1978...
Injured on 6/5/1979 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 4/16/1980 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/28/1983 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/25/1983 with a Pulled Tricep Tendon, out for 2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/5/1984...
Had first career hit on 4/8/1985, off Scott Holman (BAL)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1985, going 4-0, 1.77...
Injured on 8/28/1985 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1985...
Injured on 9/26/1987 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1988...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/3/1990 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Traded from Minnesota to St. Louis on 5/5/1993 (Going to STL: 1B P. O'Neill, P A. Rincon. Going to MIN: RF J. Burnitz, P J. Shaw, P S. Takatsu, P P. Harnisch)...
Won World Series with St. Louis in 1993...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/1/1994 to a 2-year deal worth $3,100,002 per year...
